original_title: Cinéma, de notre temps : Chantal Akerman par Chantal Akerman
overview: Janine Bazin and André Labarthe approached Chantal Akerman about making a film for the series; eagerly, Akerman proposed a number of filmmakers—but all had already been done. So she suggested…“How about me?” Akerman creates a fascinating self-portrait that takes us through her career, aided by critics Emmanuel Burdeau and Jean Narboni and filmmaker Luc Moullet.
title: Chantal Akerman by Chantal Akerman
